The 'Ith' is a ridge in Germany's Central Uplands which is up to high.<ref name="NI-
Nav">[http://www.lgn.niedersachsen.de/master/C18213905_N8077934_L20_D0_I7746208-
.html Niedersachsen navigator]</ref> It lies about 40 km southwest of
Hanover and, at 22 kilometres, is the longest line of crags in North Germany.
